footer.description: UBB helps African businesses assess their organizational health and develop sustainable growth strategies.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: UBB (Ubuntu Business Builders) is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data in accordance with applicable Senegalese and African laws, including Law No. 2008-12 of January 25, 2008 on the protection of personal data in Senegal.

assessmentData.title: Assessment Data
assessmentData.content: We collect your responses to assessment questionnaires to generate personalized reports and recommendations tailored to your business.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, modification, disclosure, or destruction.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:

exceptions.legal: Legal obligation or request from competent authorities
exceptions.aggregated: Aggregated and anonymized data for statistical analysis

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: In accordance with Senegalese legislation, you have the following rights:

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.rectification: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure of your data
rights.objection: Right to object to processing of your data

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your user experience and analyze the use of our site. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to servers located outside Senegal. We ensure that these transfers comply with international data protection standards.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us:

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Changes will be published on this page with a new update date.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These terms of service govern your use of the UBB Enterprise Health Check platform. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our platform, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms of service in their entirety.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: UBB Enterprise Health Check is a platform for assessing the organizational health of African businesses. Our services include:

features.assessment: Online assessment of your business health
features.reports: Generation of detailed and personalized reports

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: By using our services, you agree to:

obligations.authorization: Have authorization to represent your company
obligations.compliance: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
obligations.responsibility: Take responsibility for your actions on the platform

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, trademarks, and technologies of the UBB platform are protected by intellectual property rights.

rights.ubb: UBB holds all rights to the platform and its content
rights.user: You retain rights to your data and content
rights.license: You grant UBB a limited license to process your data

paymentTerms.title: Payment Terms
paymentTerms.content: Our services are offered under the following terms:

conditions.premium: Paid premium services according to our current rates
conditions.refund: Refund policy according to contractual conditions
conditions.currency: Payments accepted in FCFA, EUR, USD, and GBP

limitationLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: Within the limits allowed by Senegalese law, UBB disclaims any liability for:

limitations.advice: Advice generated by our platform is for informational purposes only
limitations.accuracy: Accuracy of data provided by users

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by Senegalese law. Any dispute will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Dakar, Senegal.

disputeResolution.title: Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: In case of dispute, we favor amicable resolution according to the following steps:

steps.mediation: Mediation by a neutral third party
steps.courts: Recourse to competent courts as a last resort

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You can terminate your account at any time. UBB reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access in case of violation of these terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of service, contact us:

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Changes will be notified to users and published on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you improve your business health. Feel free to contact us with any questions.

why.title: Why Contact Us?
why.description: Our experts can help you assess your business and provide personalized solutions.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.successMessage: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
form.errorMessage: Error sending message. Please try again.
form.privacy: By submitting this form, you agree that we may use your information to respond to you. We will never share your data with third parties.

about.title: About UBB
about.subtitle: Helping SMEs diagnose, grow, and go digital

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower SMEs with expert diagnostics, practical strategies, and digital transformation so they can become more resilient, more visible, and more competitive in today's fast-changing markets.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: UBB plays its unavoidable role in the transformative process of a world where African and global SMEs are financially stable, technologically equipped, and ready to grow beyond borders.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: We are guided by principles that define our work:

excellence.title: Excellency
excellence.description: Striving for the highest standards in every project.

courage.title: Courage & Leadership
courage.description: Making bold decisions and guiding others to do the same.

solidarity.title: Solidarity & Generosity (Ubuntu)
solidarity.description: Sharing knowledge and creating value for communities.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: UBB was born from the belief that too many SMEs fail not because of a lack of potential, but because they lack the right support.

example.title: One concrete example
example.content: Our work with STM, a company on the brink of bankruptcy, Through diagnosis, strategic guidance, and implementation, we helped them stabilize, restructure, and regain trust.
example.result: As a direct result, their revenues grew, and they doubled our consulting fee in recognition of the measurable impact.

story.content2: This experience reinforced our mission: to stand beside entrepreneurs when they need clarity most, helping them turn setbacks into growth.

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: We support SMEs in three interconnected areas:

healthCheck.title: Enterprise Health Check (free)
healthCheck.description: A diagnostic tool to assess financial and operational health.

visibility.title: Visibility & Growth Services
visibility.description: Strategies and campaigns to expand brand presence and attract clients.

development.title: Custom App Development
development.description: Building tailored digital tools that improve efficiency and create new revenue streams.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.stabilized: Helped SMEs stabilize during financial crises.
impact.export: Supported export-oriented companies to rethink strategies and open new markets.
impact.digital: Developing new digital tools to make enterprise diagnostics widely accessible.

cta.title: Ready to grow your business?
cta.subtitle: Let's build your next chapter together.

blog.title: UBB Enterprise Health Check Blog
blog.subtitle: Discover our articles, case studies and tutorials to improve your business health
blog.noArticlesDesc: No articles match your search criteria.
blog.author: Author
